title: Alisons Slow Cooker Vegetable Beef Soup

content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 1/2 pounds cubed beef stew meat" )
( ing-4 "1 (16 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables" )

content.text: 0) Place beef in a slow cooker.
2) Stir in onion, tomatoes, mixed vegetables and potatoes.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "tomatoes"@18:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "mixed vegetables"@28:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "potatoes"@49:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Season with bouillon, pepper, salt and basil.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "bouillon"@15:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "pepper"@25:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "salt"@33:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "basil"@42:47 / FOOD )
	)
)

( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "low"@11:14 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "8 hours"@15:22 / DUR )
	)
)
